reviewText: Very disappointed in the movie not the service.  Would have to think twice before buying another documentary on the band Timbiriche.

It's a shame that this documentary is been formated on a 1:33 ratio, it looks awfull in my HD T.V., I understand that before HD TV's many DVD's are not formated to look great in the new technology devices!!, but seriously this movie was even shooted in HD format so I think the DVD deserved to be at least fit a 16x9 ratio!!!, what a shame!!!
